name: Fantasy Strike
summary: A fighting game designed from the ground up to be so easy to control that even non-fighting game players can play it, yet deep enough to play in tournaments. Vibrant graphics and excellent online play.
info:
• 别名: 幻想格斗
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: FTG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2019年7月25日
  • 官方网站: http://www.fantasystrike.com/
  • 开发: Sirlin Games
  • 发行: Sirlin Games
